Replaces background with pitch black background when dark theme is on
Open Transcribro\'s website in your web browser
Review Transcribro\'s privacy policy and license (scroll down)

Transcribro privacy policy

Transcribro is a private and on-device speech recognition keyboard and service for Android.

Transcribro requires access to your microphone to work.

Transcribro uses your microphone to try to transcribe speech to text. Transcripts may be inaccurate, and can be quite wrong in some circumstances. Please ensure they are accurate before using them.

Transcribro will not send the raw microphone data (not the transcripts, just the audio recorded from the microphone) anywhere; it will stay on your device and will only be kept long enough to transcribe it to text and assist with that task.

Transcripts may be sent to other apps if other apps use Transcribro to transcribe audio (if Transcribro is invoked from other apps without Transcribro visibly launching on top of the app, those apps will require the microphone permission to use Transcribro to transcribe audio from the microphone in real-time) or when using the Transcribro Voice Input keyboard (expanded on below), but otherwise will not be sent anywhere else and will stay on your device for as long as they are needed to help with the current transcript and any features that involve processing of the current transcript.

When using the Transcribro Voice Input keyboard, audio from the microphone will be transcribed and pasted into the currently selected text box. This means the app the text box is in will see the transcripts Transcribro pastes into the app's text box, similar to using a keyboard to manually type out what you want to say.

Please follow applicable local laws about recording, and transcribe responsibly.
 
Transcribro has links to websites which are not under our control. We are not responsible for the content of linked sites. If you have any questions about policies of linked sites, please refer to them.

Transcribro's privacy policy may be updated from time to time. When it does, you will be prompted to accept the new privacy policy upon opening the app.

Privacy policy last updated date:
Year: 2024,
Month: 6,
Day: 4.
